extensionDescription.message: Smart Proxy akan secara otomatis mengaktifkan/menonaktifkan proksi untuk situs yang Anda kunjungi, berdasarkan pola yang sudah ditentukan.

popupFailedRequestsDesc.message:

If you believe that these domains are blocked, here you can add them to proxy rules list.

popupAddIgnoredFailuresConfirm.message: Are you sure to ignore the selected failures? If you do, you won't receive any more errors from them. You can change this from settings later.

popupNotAllowedSetProxySettingsChrome.message: Unfortunately changing browser settings to use System`s Proxy requires `incognito` permission. Please go to SmartProxy extension settings in browser and check the `Allow in incognito` permission. Learn how.

popupNotAllowedSetProxySettingsFirefox.message: Since Firefox 67 changing browser settings to use System`s Proxy requires `Private Browsing` permission. Please go to SmartProxy addon settings in browser and `Allow` the `Run in Private Windows` permission. Learn how.

proxyableHeaderDesc.message:
Berikut adalah daftar sumber yang digunakan atau dipanggil dari halaman ini. Gunakan daftar ini untuk menambahkan sumber ini ke aturan penggiatan proksi.
Jika Anda tidak melihat apa pun di sini, muat ulang halaman untuk melihat sumbernya.

proxyableCreateRuleConfirm.message: Anda yakin membuat aturan untuk domain yang dipilih

proxyableDeleteRuleConfirm.message: Anda yakin ingin menghapus aturan terpilih untuk:

settingsTabAboutDescription.message: Using proxies cannot be easier with SmartProxy. Think of it as configure once and forget solution. With SmartProxy you don't need to change your proxy manually or turn it on and off. All you have to do is to tell SmartProxy that you want to enable proxy for your desired website with just one click. After that, when you visit that specific website, SmartProxy will act and all you data for that website will be transferred though the proxy, without you doing anything.

settingsGeneralSmartFeaturesNoChrome.message: Firefox only! Unfortunately this feature is not supported by Chrome.

settingsGeneralProxyPerOriginDesc.message: If a rule matches the url of a tab, as a result proxy will be applied to connection of the tab. Normally there will be other requests in each page and those might not have a matched rule and thus won't have proxy applied to their connection. What `Enable proxy per tab/origin` option does is it makes sure that the whole page including all the connections from different domains and origins are using the same proxy that is applied the origin of the tab. Also this option eliminates the need to have a rule for every single domain. Please note that if no proxy is applied to the tab, proxy rules will continue to work and apply proxy to other connections in the page individually.

settingsGeneralIncognitoProfileDesc.message: Select a private browsing profile if you want to force it to be used when tab/window is in Private Browsing mode. This option will override the active profile.

settingsGeneralEnableSyncingDesc.message: Dengan mengaktifkan menyinkronkan, semua pengaturan Anda termasuk aturan, server dan langganan akan bekerja di semua peramban.

settingsGeneralSyncProxyModeDesc.message: Check if you want the active profile to be synced.

settingsProfilesTypeDesc_SmartRules.message: In this profile no proxy is applied unless you define smart rules. You will define black listed rules or in other words rules to apply proxy.

settingsProfilesTypeDesc_AlwaysEnabledBy.message: In this profile proxy servers are always applied define smart rules and skip them. You will define white listed rule or in other words rules to skip proxy and do not apply proxy.

settingsProfilesAddNewType_SmartRulesDes.message:
In this type of profile, proxy will be applied to the requests based on therules that you need to define. To define these rule you can use the popup menu in the menu bar, you can do it from settings and also you can add them from Proxyable Resource window.
Also you have the ability to subscribe to different rules list like Gfwlist.

settingsProfilesAddNewType_AlwaysEnabled.message: In this type of profile, proxy will always be applied to the requests unless you define rules to bypass it. Defining rules steps are same as in the SmartRule profile type.

settingsWelcomeMessage.message:
Welcome! I'm glad that you have chosen SmartProxy, the smart proxy switcher.
Please follow these steps to get started:

  1. Add a Proxy Server
    (Head to Proxy Servers tab and add a proxy server there)
  2. Set proxy mode to Smart Proxy mode
    (Use toolbar popup menu to change the active mode to Smart Proxy)
  3. Define Proxy Rules
    (Use toolbar popup menu to add rules or add/modify rules from Proxy Rules tab)
  4. You're all set.
